title: I have a 1 mbps download speed intenet, but league is only using 20 kbps to download and is slow af
body:
So my brother gave me a new computer and I dowloaded LoL, but when i tried to open the client and it was applying the patches i notice that it was super slow, and  that the client was only using 20 kbps of the 1 mbps of download speed my internet have. What can i do?

and it have  15558mb to download

replies.body: You might be having problems getting a faster download if you haven't set up the network settings in the best way yet, so take a few minutes to go through these [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) steps and let me know if that helps. You could also go ahead and try using an ethernet cord as well!
